relationships.description: Snape and Dumbledore are having an argument. ("Snape took a step toward Dumbledore.")
Sirius Black tried to kill Pettigrew, according to Snape. ("You haven’t forgotten that, Headmaster? You haven’t forgotten that he once tried to kill me?")
Harry and Hermione both burst into speech at the same time. ("They both burst into speech at the same time.")
